Service Details: - Promotes health and wellness for residents at all stages of life- Most programs and services are offered by volunteer members of the centre- Programs and services vary, but generally include art classes, Bingo, Bridge, carpet bowling, woodcarving, ceramics, choir, clogging, Cribbage, floor curling, Keep Fit, line dancing, and snooker
Hours: Please call for program times and hours of operation
Eligibility: To become a member, you must be at least 50 years of age
Cost: Membership - runs from May 1 - Apr 30; dues are $20/year
Address & Map: 3661 Hwy Old OkanaganWest Kelowna, BC     V4T 1P6
Major Intersection: Old Okanagan Hwy and Drought Rd
